name: io.opsera/opsera
description: Opsera AI Agent MCP server providing authenticated DevOps automation over SSE

tools.name: ask_workflow
tools.description: Run, create, or stop pipelines and tasks through the Opsera AI Agent using workflow context.

question.description: Instruction or question related to running workflows, pipelines, or tasks

context.description: Additional workflow context data (pipeline IDs, task IDs, etc.)

tools.name: ask_insights_question
tools.description: Ask insights or analytics questions about dashboards, metrics, or general data.

question.description: Insights-focused question for the AI agent

context.description: Additional insights context (dashboard ids, filters, etc.)

tools.name: ask_generic_question
tools.description: Ask general questions to the Opsera AI Agent not tied to workflows or insights dashboards.

question.description: General question for the AI agent

tools.name: ask_salesforce_question
tools.description: Ask Salesforce-related questions to the Opsera AI Agent, including pipelines or data tied to Salesforce workflows.

question.description: Salesforce question for the AI agent

context.description: Additional Salesforce context (record IDs, objects, etc.)

prompts.name: pipeline_analysis
prompts.description: Analyze pipeline performance and provide recommendations

prompts.name: troubleshooting

arguments.name: error_description

prompts.name: performance_review
prompts.description: Review overall DevOps performance and provide improvement suggestions
